ch0188_00_dexio/0101_0701_02_10: Well then, let’s seek out new encounters!
ch0188_00_dexio/7101_0701_01_10: Have you already met my Trainer friend, Sina?
ch0188_00_dexio/7101_0701_03_10:
She can be a little pushy sometimes, but she’s a
kind and strong Trainer.
ch0188_00_dexio/7102_0701_01_10:
Pasio is an ideal tourist spot. All kinds of
Pokémon Trainers come here!
ch0188_00_dexio/7102_0701_02_10:
And what’s the best part about tourist spots?
That’s right—unique local fashions!
ch0188_00_dexio/7102_0701_03_10:
When I visited Alola, I actually wore some Alolan
clothing while sightseeing.
ch0188_00_dexio/7103_0701_01_10:
By spending time with us, Pokémon will come to
trust us.
ch0188_00_dexio/7103_0701_02_10:
That’s why I think it’s really important to cherish
the time we spend with Pokémon...
ch0188_00_dexio/7104_0701_01_10:
Recently, I’ve started doing some research into
Legendary Pokémon.
ch0188_00_dexio/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s pretty interesting! Some Pokémon have robust
folklore built up around them, whereas others are
shrouded in mystery!
ch0188_00_dexio/7104_0701_03_10:
There are still so many things we don’t know
about this world or about Pokémon...
ch0188_00_dexio/7105_0701_01_10:
Since I came all the way to Pasio, I’d like to enjoy
more than just battling.
ch0188_00_dexio/7105_0701_02_10:
Are there any sightseeing spots around here that
you recommend, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0188_00_dexio/7105_0701_03_10:
Although...I imagine Sina will only be interested
in places where she can battle...
ch0188_00_dexio/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey! I’ve been looking for you. There’s something
I’d like to give you.
ch0188_00_dexio/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you can put it to good use!
ch0188_00_dexio/2501_0701_01_10:
There’s something I’ve realized since coming to
Pasio.
ch0188_00_dexio/2501_0701_02_10: I actually really enjoy supporting others.
ch0188_00_dexio/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s different from the joy of battling alone,
you know?
ch0188_00_dexio/2501_0702_01_10:
Back in the day, Professor Sycamore entrusted me
with a Pokédex, and I went on a journey around
Kalos.
ch0188_00_dexio/2501_0702_02_10:
Seeing new Trainers now reminds me how exciting
that journey was.
ch0188_00_dexio/2501_0702_03_10:
I hope these Trainers get to experience that
excitement for themselves.
ch0188_00_dexio/2511_0701_01_10:
What would you say is the most important thing
to a Trainer?
ch0188_00_dexio/2511_0701_02_10:
If I had to answer, I’d say having a partner you
can trust.
ch0188_00_dexio/2511_0701_03_10:
Whether it’s Pokémon or a tag battle partner, it’s
essential to have allies who’ll fight beside you.
ch0188_00_dexio/2511_0702_01_10:
What would you say to being on a team with
me and Sina?
ch0188_00_dexio/2511_0702_02_10:
If the three of us work together, I’m sure we’ll
be the best!
ch0188_00_dexio/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s such a pleasant morning. On days like this, I
like to go sightseeing around the island.
ch0188_00_dexio/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m planning to do some training with Sina soon.
Would you like to come along?
ch0188_00_dexio/3005_0701_01_10:
This was another day well spent. Did you make
any new discoveries?
